questions.question: I think you .................................. consult a doctor.
questions.description: The expression I think you should is used to make polite suggestions.

questions.question: Let's buy some flowers for her, .....................................?
questions.description: Shall is used in question tags after let.

questions.question: I don't mind .................................... the housework.
questions.description: We use an ing form after I don't mind.

questions.question: I don't like ........................................... up early in the morning.
questions.description: Like is followed by an infinitive.

questions.question: ........................................ I get you something to drink?
questions.description: Shall I is used in polite offers to do something.

questions.question: ............................................. you like me to type your letters for you?
Would you mind if I ...................................... some music?
questions.description: We use a past tense after would you mind...?

questions.question: I'm not really into films. I would rather ..................................... a book.
questions.description: Would rather is followed by an infinitive without to.

questions.question: John ..................................... ten minutes ago.
questions.description: We use the past simple to say when something happened.

questions.question: We were having lunch when someone ......................................... on the floor.
questions.description: The past simple is used to talk about the short action that happened in the middle of the long action.
